body:
```

$ spack install jube
==> python@3.6.8 : externally installed in /usr
[+] /usr
==> Installing py-setuptools
==> No binary for py-setuptools found: installing from source
==> Using cached archive: /vol0001/hp200139/data/u00444/projects/spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/4a/4a7708dafd2d360ce5e2ac7577374da9fb65fc867bc4cdaf461f9f834dfa6ac3.zip
==> py-setuptools: Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    '/usr/bin/python' '-s' 'setup.py' '--no-user-cfg' 'build'
See build log for details:
  /home/hp200139/u00444/spack-stage/spack-stage-py-setuptools-50.1.0-jef3aqs35wzc5q6kbdqjlby55ep2gskf/spack-build-out.txt

==> Warning: Skipping build of jube since py-setuptools failed
==> Error: Installation of jube failed.  Review log for details
```
title: Installation issue: py-setuptools
